ygData.subject: grouping
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, go anywhere where there are psycho trains or fast spawns.  :)  I m serious...try places like HighHold, Unrest, or Cazic depending on your level.
ygData.messageBody:
>Don't know, wizards are pretty much sought after where I come from. I
>never have problems getting a group in Mistmoore, if there is a group
>wit ha free spot.

Yeah, go anywhere where there are psycho trains or fast spawns. :) I'm
serious...try places like HighHold, Unrest, or Cazic depending on your
level. I've personally found these places to be easiest to find a
group....not every night though, some nights are just hopeless. But more
often than not, they'll be somebody in need of our services. I've never
been to Mistmoore, but it sounds like a pretty good spot too. I hung around
S Karanas for a bit killing chickens, but I found that place to be pretty
tough to find a group...especially if you can't reliably hit the Advocets
till your about 24 at least.

-- Lim'Dul
